select 
	id, lob_cd,
       lob,
       fk_client_id from [glb_master_data_core].[lob]
where id < 0
union all
SELECT 
	ROW_NUMBER() over (order by lob), *
FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT
       lob_cd,
       lob,
       client.id as fk_client_id
FROM
(
       select
             lob_cd,
             lob,
             client
       from
             [glb_master_data_core].[lob]
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].[client]
                           on [lob].fk_client_id = client.id
                    inner join  [glb_master_data_core].lt_country_client
                           on [client].id = lt_country_client.fk_client_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].country
                           on country.id = lt_country_client.fk_country_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].region
                           on region.id = country.fk_region_id
       WHERE region.region = 'FAB'
) lob
       inner join [reg20_master_data_core].[client]
             on lob.client = [client].client
) a;

WITH SUBQ AS (
SELECT 
	ROW_NUMBER() over (order by lob) as id, *
FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT
       lob_cd,
       lob,
       client.id as fk_client_id
FROM
(
       select
             lob_cd,
             lob,
             client
       from
             [glb_master_data_core].[lob]
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].[client]
                           on [lob].fk_client_id = client.id
                    inner join  [glb_master_data_core].lt_country_client
                           on [client].id = lt_country_client.fk_client_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].country
                           on country.id = lt_country_client.fk_country_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].region
                           on region.id = country.fk_region_id
       WHERE region.region = 'FAB'
) lob
       inner join [reg20_master_data_core].[client]
             on lob.client = [client].client
) a)

select 
	id, lob_cd,
       lob,
       id from [glb_master_data_core].[lob]
where id < 0
union all
SELECT 
	ROW_NUMBER() over (order by sub_lob), *
FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT
       sub_lob_cd,
       sub_lob,
          SUBQ.id as fk_lob_id    
FROM
(
       select distinct
             sub_lob_cd,
             sub_lob,
                    lob_cd,
                    lob
       from
             [glb_master_data_core].[lob]
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].[client]
                           on [lob].fk_client_id = client.id
                    inner join  [glb_master_data_core].lt_country_client
                           on [client].id = lt_country_client.fk_client_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].country
                           on country.id = lt_country_client.fk_country_id
                    inner join [glb_master_data_core].region
                           on region.id = country.fk_region_id
                                 inner join [glb_master_data_core].sub_lob
                                        on [lob].id = sub_lob.fk_lob_id
       WHERE region.region = 'FAB'
) sub_lob
       inner join SUBQ
             on SUBQ.lob = [sub_lob].lob) b
select * from glb_master_data_core.system where system_cd in ('sys_000009', 'sys_000010', 'sys_000012') or id<0

SELECT cm.*
  FROM [glb_master_data_core].[country] c
  join [glb_master_data_core].[region] r on c.fk_region_id = r.id
  join [glb_master_data_core].[company] cm on cm.fk_country_id = c.id
  where r.region = 'FAB'
union all
select * from [glb_master_data_core].[company] cm
where id < 0
